categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Nez Peron system was a star system located in the D'Astan sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Nez Peron.
During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the Nez Peron system was the theater of a battle concluded with a Sith victory.
